channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "Parsing And Analysing Ruby For Fun And Profit"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "Parsing And Analysing Ruby For Fun And Profit"

item.title: Suggestion from the proposer
item.description: More or less both. Part of understanding the need for these tools is the limitations of the MRI parser. I won't go into too specific details though, one could speak for hours and hours about how the MRI parser works.

item.title: Suggestion from John Pagonis (@)
item.description: Will the talk give insight to the CRuby parser in order to appreciate the concept in general or in order to find plug-points to exploit in tooling?
